description: Making pâte à choux is not difficult at all It is simply a matter of bringing water and butter to a boil, then dumping in flour and stirring it until a mass forms, which takes only a minute or two You let the steaming dough cool for a moment, then beat in a few eggs, one at a time
title: Pâte à Choux for Cheese Puffs and Cream Puffs
title_page: Pâte à Choux for Cheese Puffs and Cream Puffs Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Making pâte à choux is not difficult at all. It is simply a matter of bringing water and butter to a boil, then dumping in flour and stirring it until a mass forms, which takes only a minute or two. You let the steaming dough cool for a moment, then beat in a few eggs, one at a time. That’s it.
Featured in: Sweet Or Savory, A Bite At A Time.
